meanings.definition: The act or process of not consuming something.
meanings.sent1: Her nonconsumptions of sugary snacks helped her stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The nonconsumptions of fuel led to a decrease in pollution.
meanings.sent3: His nonconsumptions of vegetables were legendary among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The nonconsumptions of knowledge left him feeling empty inside.
meanings.sent5: Nonconsumptions of water can lead to dehydration.

meanings.definition: The state of not being consumed.
meanings.sent1: The nonconsumptions of the cake made it last for days.
meanings.sent2: The nonconsumptions of the resources preserved the environment.
meanings.sent3: The nonconsumptions of the book made it a timeless classic.
meanings.sent4: Her nonconsumptions of time seemed to defy all logic.
meanings.sent5: Nonconsumptions of energy can be beneficial in certain situations.

meanings.sent1: The nonconsumptions of food were due to the lack of appetite.
meanings.sent2: The nonconsumptions of products resulted in surplus inventory.
meanings.sent3: His nonconsumptions of media made him feel out of touch.
meanings.sent4: The nonconsumptions of resources highlighted the need for conservation.
meanings.sent5: Nonconsumptions of electricity can help reduce utility bills.
